onyomiExamples.meaning: (some type of) enthusiast, somebody possessed of a (certain kind of) mental abnormality

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to go mad, to lose one's mind, to go crazy, to go insane, to get out of order, to go amiss, to malfunction, to become imprecise, to go wrong (of a plan or expectation, etc.), to fall through, to get mixed up, to go crazy (over someone or something), to get enthusiastic, to go wild
mad (with grief, love, etc.), crazy, out of one's mind, on the verge of insanity
